001package gust.backend;
002
003
004import com.google.common.html.types.TrustedResourceUrlProto;
005import com.google.template.soy.data.SanitizedContent;
006import com.google.template.soy.data.UnsafeSanitizedContentOrdainer;
007
008import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
009import javax.inject.Inject;
010import java.net.URI;
011import java.net.URL;
012
013
014/**
015 * Describes a framework application controller, which is pre-loaded with convenient access to tooling, and any injected
016 * application logic. Alternatively, if the invoking developer wishes to use their own base class, they can acquire most
017 * or all of the enclosed functionality via injection.
018 *
019 * <p>Various <pre>protected</pre> properties are made available which allow easy access to stuff:</p>
020 * <ul>
021 *   <li><b><pre>context</pre>:</b> This property exposes a builder for the current flow's page context. This can be
022 *       manipulated to provide/inject properties, and then subsequently used in Soy.</li>
023 * </ul>
024 *
025 * <p>To make use of this controller, simply inherit from it in your own <pre>@Controller</pre>-annotated class. When a
026 * request method is invoked, the logic provided by this object will have been initialized and will be ready to use.</p>
027 */
028@SuppressWarnings("unused")
029public abstract class AppController extends BaseController {
030  /**
031   * Private constructor, which accepts injected manager objects. Some or all of these are passed up to
032   * {@link BaseController}.
033   *
034   * @param pageContextManager Page context manager.
035   */
036  @Inject public AppController(@Nonnull PageContextManager pageContextManager) {
037    super(pageContextManager);
038  }
039
040  // -- API: Trusted Resources -- //
041
042  /**
043   * Generate a trusted resource URL for the provided Java URL.
044   *
045   * @param url Pre-ordained trusted resource URL.
046   * @return Trusted resource URL specification proto.
047   */
048  public TrustedResourceUrlProto trustedResource(@Nonnull URL url) {
049    return UnsafeSanitizedContentOrdainer.ordainAsSafe(
050      url.toString(),
051      SanitizedContent.ContentKind.TRUSTED_RESOURCE_URI)
052      .toTrustedResourceUrlProto();
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Generate a trusted resource URL for the provided Java URI.
057   *
058   * @param uri Pre-ordained trusted resource URI.
059   * @return Trusted resource URL specification proto.
060   */
061  public TrustedResourceUrlProto trustedResource(@Nonnull URI uri) {
062    return UnsafeSanitizedContentOrdainer.ordainAsSafe(
063      uri.toString(),
064      SanitizedContent.ContentKind.TRUSTED_RESOURCE_URI)
065      .toTrustedResourceUrlProto();
066  }
067}
